name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D】生演奏！？楽しんだもん勝ちのBANDLIVE！【#常闇トワ1周年記念】 [TjhOZn1vNW4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Gira Gira' by Ado, covered by Tokoyami Towa with a live band.
MC section where Tokoyami Towa talks about the songs she just performed and introduces the next one.

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに振る舞っていたい
subtitles.english: I want to behave brilliantly

subtitles.original: それは世界の方？ それとも私の方ですか？
subtitles.english: Is it for the world's sake? Or for mine?

subtitles.original: 共生は端から無理でしょう
subtitles.english: Symbiosis is impossible from the start

subtitles.original: まがいものこそ悲しけれ
subtitles.english: Fakes are all the more sad

subtitles.original: 無我夢中　走る　走る
subtitles.english: Running, running, lost in the moment

subtitles.original: 強さが正義なら　洗い流す前に
subtitles.english: If strength is justice, before washing it away...

subtitles.original: 行こう　食欲のあざ抱いて
subtitles.english: Let's go, embracing the bruises of desire

subtitles.original: メラメラ火を吹いて
subtitles.english: Spitting out flaring flames

subtitles.original: 私は夜の神
subtitles.english: I am the god of the night

subtitles.original: ラッパッパ　そこで見てろこの乱舞
subtitles.english: Rap-pa-pa, watch this wild dance right there

subtitles.original: 脆くない　あなたなりの名画
subtitles.english: Not fragile, a masterpiece in your own way

subtitles.original: ラッパッパ　不意にファニー　孤独は solitary
subtitles.english: Rap-pa-pa, suddenly funny, loneliness is solitary

subtitles.original: いくつな街を行く　目を閉じて
subtitles.english: Walking through several towns, closing my eyes

subtitles.original: もう一回　もう一回
subtitles.english: One more time, one more time

subtitles.original: もしも神様が左利きなら
subtitles.english: If God were left-handed...

subtitles.original: どんなに幸せか　しれない
subtitles.english: I don't know how happy I'd be

subtitles.original: ギラギラ輝いて
subtitles.english: Sparkling brightly

subtitles.original: 私は夜の神
subtitles.english: I am the god of the night

subtitles.original: ラッパッパ　今に見とけこの乱舞
subtitles.english: Rap-pa-pa, watch this wild dance now

subtitles.original: 噛み締める　1ミリグラムの火花
subtitles.english: Savoring a milligram of sparks

subtitles.original: ラッパッパ　なんてファニー　これはビター
subtitles.english: Rap-pa-pa, how funny, this is bitter

subtitles.original: ギラ
subtitles.english: Gira

subtitles.original: ギラギラ
subtitles.english: Gira gira

subtitles.original: ギラ
subtitles.english: Gira

subtitles.original: ギラギラ
subtitles.english: Gira gira

subtitles.original: ギラ　炎を吐いて
subtitles.english: Gira, spitting flames

subtitles.original: ありのままじゃいられない
subtitles.english: I can't stay as I am

subtitles.original: 誰も彼も勝手に素晴らしい世界だ
subtitles.english: Everyone, in their own way, in this wonderful world

subtitles.original: ギラついていこう
subtitles.english: Let's keep on sparkling

subtitles.original: ハハハハ、はぁ〜はぁ〜はぁ〜しちゃってました〜
subtitles.english: Hahahaha, haa~ panting, panting, I was panting~

subtitles.original: あっという間に、えー、2曲、えー、今の曲が、やばい、曲名が...
subtitles.english: In the blink of an eye, uh, two songs. Uh, the song just now, oh no, the title...

subtitles.original: 『カワキをアメク』という曲と、さっきの曲が『ギラギラ』という曲でした。
subtitles.english: "Kawaki wo Ameku" and the song before that was "Gira Gira."

subtitles.original: えー、『カワキをアメク』って曲は...
subtitles.english: Uh, the song "Kawaki wo Ameku"...

subtitles.original: お水飲む。
subtitles.english: I'll drink some water.

subtitles.original: みんなで見ないよ。
subtitles.english: Don't watch, everyone.

subtitles.original: スタッフさんがね、優しく、お水をくれました。感謝！
subtitles.english: The staff members, so kindly, gave me some water. Thank you!

subtitles.original: いやもう、スタッフさんも、ありがとうございますと、この場をお借りして言わせてもらいます。
subtitles.english: And also, I'd like to take this opportunity to thank the staff members as well.

subtitles.original: いや、『カワキをアメク』は、あのー、実は、結構前、いつだっけな、の時に、なんか流行りの曲を覚えようみたいな枠をしてて
subtitles.english: Well, "Kawaki wo Ameku" is, uh, actually, quite a while ago, I forget when, I did a stream where I tried to learn some popular songs.

subtitles.original: そん時に、美波さんの『カワキをアメク』と、『夜に駆ける』を練習して
subtitles.english: At that time, I practiced "Kawaki wo Ameku" by Minami and "Yoru ni Kakeru."

subtitles.original: 『カワキをアメク』はそこじゃな、その枠で覚えた曲なので
subtitles.english: I learned "Kawaki wo Ameku" then, during that stream.

subtitles.original: こうしてな、ライブでね、みんなに、生音でね、披露できたのが嬉しいなって思います。
subtitles.english: So I'm really happy to be able to perform it live with a band for everyone like this.

subtitles.original: この曲は生で歌うのがむずい！ 早い！ トワの滑舌 VS 音楽
subtitles.english: This song is hard to sing live! It's fast! Towa's enunciation vs. the music.

subtitles.original: そんな感じでしたけど、大丈夫だったかな、みんな。見てた？
subtitles.english: It was like that, but was it okay, everyone? Were you watching?

subtitles.original: ド、ドラム止まれ！ いいの、ドラムはね、いいの、叩かせてあげて、みんなもう、大きな心で叩かせてあげて、ドラムを。
subtitles.english: D-Drum, stop! It's okay, let the drums play. Everyone, with a big heart, let the drums play.

subtitles.original: 叩き出した！ 叩いちゃうから、可愛い。
subtitles.english: They started drumming! They're drumming, how cute.

subtitles.original: いいんだよ、叩いて。いいんだよ。
subtitles.english: It's okay, go ahead and drum. It's okay.

subtitles.original: そうそう、で『カワキをアメク』と、さっきの『ギラギラ』はね、あの『うっせぇわ』を、かなたと上げたんですけど、そのAdoさんが歌っている曲になります。
subtitles.english: Right, right. So, "Kawaki wo Ameku" and the previous "Gira Gira"... I covered "Usseewa" with Kanata, and this is another song sung by Ado.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、『カワキをアメク』も『ギラギラ』もすごい難しかったんだけど、まあ、うまく歌えたのかな、と思います。
subtitles.english: A bit, you know, both "Kawaki wo Ameku" and "Gira Gira" were really difficult, but well, I think I was able to sing them well.

subtitles.original: もう色んな曲を歌ってきたんで、で、結構激しい曲と、まあなんだろう、難しい曲と流行りの曲と歌ったんで
subtitles.english: I've sung a lot of songs already, and I've sung some pretty intense ones, well, some difficult ones and popular ones.

subtitles.original: 次は、あの、しっとりした曲を歌おうかなって思っております。
subtitles.english: Next, uh, I'm thinking of singing a mellow song.

subtitles.original: みんなもね、休憩タイム、心穏やかにしましょう。
subtitles.english: Everyone, it's break time, let's calm our hearts.

subtitles.original: では、次の曲、しっとりした曲、聞いてください。『Wherever you are』
subtitles.english: Then, the next song, a mellow song, please listen. "Wherever you are."
